alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:49PM EDT until July 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Western Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/. * At 549 PM EDT/449 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blue Springs to near Newton to near Geneva, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Blakely, Geneva, Chipley, Graceville, Headland, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia and Pinckard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
